entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:50 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:07 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 2:07 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:07 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
